duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care under the supervision of the registered nurse, including IV therapy and recognition and treatment of physical and psychosocial changes unique to patient age/population group served.
Apply customer service behaviors and communication skills in the delivery of patient care.
Preferably have previous nursing experience in specialty areas such as Critical Care, Emergency Room, Cath Lab, and Urgent Care.
Stay updated with educational programs to maintain current knowledge and clinical skills.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited School of Practical/Vocational Nursing. Eligible for, or currently licensed as a Practical Nurse in Pennsylvania. CPR certification required.
